title: Creating Visualizations with Display Objects
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create visualizations with display objects using scikit-learn. Display objects are classes that allow us to create visualizations directly from their respective metrics. In this lab, we will use the ConfusionMatrixDisplay, RocCurveDisplay, and PrecisionRecallDisplay display objects to create visualizations for a binary classification problem.
